--- title: Data & Analysis date: today --- # Source The data comes from IPCC reports and has been gathered from the [IPCC's website](https://www.ipcc.ch/site/assets/uploads/2018/02/WG1AR5_Chapter08_FINAL.pdf) # Data ## Raw data ### Volt gathered data Here's the original data from the Volt Repo: (Unit= GtCO2) ::: {.cell tab-view='auto' width='100%' execution_count=1} ``` {.python .cell-code} import pandas as pd df = pd.read_json("https://storage.googleapis.com/open.data.arnov.dev/volt/climate/data/ipcc-data.json") df ``` ::: {#volt-gathered-data .cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=1} ```{=html}
name source year budgetEstimation target

``` ::: ::: ### IPCC source data Now the data straight from the IPCC: (Unit= GtCO2) ::: {.cell execution_count=2} ``` {.python .cell-code} import pandas as pd data = pd.read_json("https://storage.googleapis.com/open.data.arnov.dev/volt/climate/data/ipcc-table.json", orient='table') data ``` ::: {#ipcc-source-data-(unit-gtco2 .cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=2} ```{=html}

``` ::: ::: ### IPCC Annual emissions per country ::: {.cell tab-view='auto' width='100%' execution_count=3} ``` {.python .cell-code} import pandas as pd df = pd.read_csv("https://storage.googleapis.com/open.data.arnov.dev/volt/climate/data/annual-co2-emissions-per-country.csv") df ``` ::: {#annual-emissions-data .cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=3} ```{=html}

``` ::: ::: ## Distribution of IPCC projections ::: {.cell tab-view='auto' width='100%' execution_count=4} ``` {.python .cell-code} import pandas as pd columns = [ 'Budget', 'Degree', 'name', 'score', 'bootstrap_score', 'bootstrap_pass', 'loc', 'scale', 'arg' ] df = pd.read_csv("https://storage.googleapis.com/open.data.arnov.dev/volt/climate/data/fit-percent-goal-results.csv.zip") df[columns].dropna(subset=['name']).style \ .apply(lambda row: row['color'], axis=1, subset=['bootstrap_pass']) \ .apply(lambda color: f'background-color: {color}', axis=1) \ .set_caption('Distribution of IPCC projections') ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-error} ``` KeyError: 'color' ``` ::: ::: {#fitting-to-percent-chance-data .cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=4} ``` ``` ::: :::
